mapper.select: SELECT * FROM llm_word w where w.word = #{s}

select c.n, c.word, c.leftword, c.rightword, w.word cw, lw.word lw, rw.word rw from llm_word_compound c, llm_word w, llm_word lw, llm_word rw where #{n} in (c.leftword , c.rightword) and c.word = w.n and c.leftword = lw.n and c.rightword = rw.n
select * from plm_learn l order by l.n desc limit 100
select * from plm_learn l where l.word = #{n}

select w.word lw, rw.word rw, c.cnt, c.leftword, c.rightword from plm_context c, llm_word w, llm_word rw where c.leftword = w.n and c.rightword = rw.n and #{n} in (c.leftword, c.rightword) order by c.cnt desc

select b.src, w.word, w.type, w.memo, w.n, bw.i, b.n understand from plm_understand_box b, plm_understand_box_word bw, llm_word w where b.n = bw.understand and bw.word = w.n and b.activate = TRUE order by b.src, bw.i
mapper.insert: insert into llm_word(word, type, memo) values(#{word}, #{type}, #{wordMemo})
INSERT into llm_word_compound (word, leftword, rightword) values(#{word}, #{leftword}, #{rightword}) on duplicate key update leftword = #{leftword}, rightword = #{rightword}, updated_date = now()
insert into plm_context(leftword, rightword) values(#{leftword}, #{rightword}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cnt = cnt + 1, updated_date = now()
mapper.delete: delete from llm_word where type like '학습%' and not exists(select 1 from plm_learn l where l.word = llm_word.n)
